title: Two Roads to Guadalupe
description: An exciting novel about the Mexican war. The heros are the Shelby 14 year old Sam and Blaine who joins the war effort because he expects the campaign to be culturally broadening. The saga is derring-do lusty action, and black-hearted villainy in the midst of the surging, brutal, yet valiant, strugle with Mexico.
author: Robert Lewis Taylor
